comment: This professor is amazing! She is so caring and helpful. She gives you activities and lessons you can actually use with your students. She gives you so much materials you can use in your classroom. She was my favorite professor! 10/10 recommend taking her!!!!

Professor Collins is on of the best professors I ever had! She works with you to make sure you understand everything and can be contacted outside of class with no issues. Her class consists of weekly labs, quizzes, models and explantions, 3 exams, and 1 final assignment that counts as your exam 4/final exam. She also gives 2nd chances on most work.

Her classes are full of activities that you can do with your kids in the field. None of her classes were ever boring. Your grade is mainly participation/attendance. Very easy A and definitely worth your time! You won't regret taking this class.

Professor Collins made this course pretty easy with her lenient grading. Overall as long as you are completing the assignments you will likely get an A. The quizzes can be difficult but they are open note so it is not too bad. Attending class is important, however, missing a few classes will not hurt your grade. No final for this course!!
I loved Professor Collins. She is very hilarious, inspirational, and her lectures are extremely engaging! You'll feel like a kid in a candy store in her class, I promise.

Terry collins is by far THE BEST TEACHER in this program. She is the only professor that I will implement what I learned in my classroom. Most everything is hands on activities that you can implement in your own classroom. When you take classes that break down standards its usually boring and very repetitive, you to actually experience it. Freeitem

Professor Collins is without a doubt THE BEST professor I have taken in my four years at Kennesaw. There are literally not enough words in my vocabulary to express how amazing she is! Her class is so engaging, and hands on.  She is so passionate and loves what she does. I have never learned more in a college class than hers. TAKE HER!

I LOVE TERRY (the name she goes by)! She was PHENOMENAL. We did science lessons and activities for Elementary Students in her class. She gave amazing tips on teaching! She is not a big fan of giving us too much work to do outside of class. You have 3 assignments (Data Analysis, Lesson Plan, and Mentor Text)- easy grader & provides great feedback!

Dr. Collins is beyond amazing! She left a lasting first impression on us when she gave us a whole bunch of supplies the first class for us to use. She gives us so many materials and ideas that we can use in our classrooms. Easiest and best class you'll probably take if you take it with her.

There are not enough words on this planet to express how absolutely amazing she is. She gives you so many resources and does lessons with you so you can see how to do them yourself and adjust them as needed. She spends her own money on things to give us for free. She is always willing to give and provide for you. Please take her if you can.
All i have to say is SHE IS THE BEST PROFESSOR AT KSU. She is extremely giving. She spends her own money to provide us with a huge amount of resources for our class. shes is just amazing! TAKE HER

I absolutely LOVE Professor Collins. I "accidently" had her for ISCI 2002 in 2019, as she took over the course for someone else. We had a lab in each class or an assignment we worked in groups. All the coursework was meaningful and she clarified how uncomplicated it is to teach science to children of any age, grade level, culture or background.

Professor Collins is the best! She is full of resources and cares so much about her students. She only grades on a few things, but is a fairly easy grader and gives you as many resources as you may need. If it were up to me, she would have taught all of my classes this semester.

If it was up to me Professor Collins would teach every education class at Kennesaw!! She is so amazing and super sweet. Especially with the tough times we are going through right now with COVID she made everything really easy to understand and I could not have had a better experience. She gave us so much that we could use in our actual classrooms!

TAKE SUSAN COLLINS!!! The sweetest lady. We did few graded things but each class she gives you assignments you would do with students and tells you how you would teach it. At the end of the semester, she gave us a box full of classroom things! She has great tips and I learned so much in her class! She is awesome!!!

This class is being combined with 3303 to create 3302. Collins is probably the most caring professor you will find. Most of our 45 minute classes were spent learning real lessons about what actually happens in a classroom, not what happens in a textbook. Take her whenever you get the chance! You won't regret it!!
Best professor you will ever take. Really taught how to teach science in an elementary classroom. One of the only classes I actually learned in. Go out of your way to take her- she is amazing!

Literally the best professor I have ever had! She is amazing. If you ever get the chance to have her, DO IT! You will not be disappointed. She is very knowledgeable, and actually teaches useful information. The textbook is one I will use for the rest of my career.
Could not sing enough praises for this professor!! I'd recommend her to everyone!!

GREAT teacher! She gave us a TON of practical lesson plans and creative ideas to use in our future classrooms. We only had one lesson plan to teach as our grade, but she graded easy. She gave us free stuff to put in our classrooms too. She's awesome and inspirational. Take her!
